comments.message: NiteKid Chong want to upgrade your car liao?
Wow!! Can I get at least a test drive :)

1.post_text:
The BMW i8, which is the first BMW plug-in hybrid sports car built with the revolutionary LifeDrive architecture and features the latest BMW EfficientDynamics technology, is finally here in our showroom.

Drop by 303 Alexandra Road and check out the most progressive sports car by BMW to date!

2.post_text: Missed our roving test drives at East Coast Park today? Drop by tomorrow from 10am to 6pm at Kallang Leisure Park and experience the new BMW 2 Series Active Tourer!

comments.message: New BMW owners, do go for Wish 1. The BMW Driving Experience is not-to-be-missed. I really benefited from this.

3.post_text:
This holiday, receive the joy of driving with the excellent handling of the BMW 3 Series or experience the superior performance of the stunning BMW 5 Series.

Performance Motors celebrates its 35th anniversary and the season of giving with a range of exclusive offers. With every purchase of the BMW 3 Series, BMW 5 Series and selected BMW models, you can choose from one of four fabulous wishes and we will make it come true:

4.post_text: Who says you can’t play golf, cycle and have a picnic with the family all on the same weekend? Put the BMW 2 Series Active Tourer to the test. Look out for our roving test drives this weekend at East Coast Park from 10 am to 6 pm.

5.post_text:
Space-functional concept becomes a reality in the BMW 2 Series Active Tourer.

Perfect for families, the BMW 2 Series Active Tourer boasts a roomy interior dominated by a feeling of lightness.

Come pop by 303 Alexandra Road and experience it.

7.post_text:
A progressive form of leadership can be found in the BMW 7 Series - from its chrome accents on the front apron to the innovative drive train and chassis technologies.

Experience the sheer driving pleasure of the BMW 7 Series at our showroom.

comments.message: This is like spot the difference contest. I prefer 2 with the blue rim on the steering wheel and modern interior.

8.post_text: Both interior designs of the BMW i3 give you the lively and contemporary feel. Which will you pick?

9.post_text:
BMW i3 - the future of urban mobility. The new BMW i3 stands out for pure electric driving on busy streets in and around the city.

Head down to 303 Alexandra Road and test drive for yourself.

(Photo credit: https://www.facebook.com/vanqphotorque)

10.post_text:
Beauty through the lens. How creative can you get with the new BMW i3?

Share with us your most creative photo with the BMW i3 at the Singapore International Photography Festival and stand to win BMW i3 merchandise.

Simply upload your photo onto our Facebook page or on your instagram and tag us @PML_SG. Do remember to hashtag #BMWi3Spotted.

comments.message: Hi Niraj Agarwal, Thanks for your comment. We see what you did there :)  Drop by our showroom to find out all about the amazing deals & offers we have in store for you.

11.post_text: Feast your eyes on all our latest cars and get ready to be excited with amazing deals to celebrate 35 years of unrivalled performance at Performance Motors. Do give us a shout if you would be dropping by any time soon.

12.post_text: Top Gear Singapore just redefined Movember for us. This surely is a sight itself, where the 1950 Fiat Nuova meets the all-new BMW i3.

13.post_text:
Performance Motors is celebrating 35 years of unrivalled performance with 35 extraordinary deals on a range of models from the stunning BMW 4 Series Convertible to the adventurous BMW X3. 

Enjoy a complimentary Yacht Experience and cash savings when you purchase selected BMW models. Have a taste for adventure? Then you’ll be interested in the $10,000 cash savings on a range of BMW X models. 

Alternatively, Performance Direct gives you the flexibility to drive off with a BMW of your choice, including the all-new BMW i3, from just $1,999 per month with zero down payment. 

These great offers will end this weekend. So don’t miss out. Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8051 for a test drive.

14.post_text:
This is a carbon fibre reinforced plastic life module which is found in our BMW i3. Talk about strong and lightweight at the same time. 

Test drive this marvel yourself and experience the all-electric side of the BMW i3. We are at 303 Alexandra Road.

15.post_text: Ever wondered how your favourite BMW cars are made? Take a sneak peek at our production line! http://on.fb.me/1xEAY9Y

16.post_text: Did you join us at this evening's Performance Motorsports Circle Kart Race? We hope you had your pulse racing at every turn at the KF1 Karting Circuit, Singapore's first international-class karting track!

17.post_text: In this case it might be the BMW i8. But there is so much more to choose from. Just drop by 303 Alexandra Road during lunch or whenever you are free and feast your eyes on the amazing BMW car line up we've got for you.

18.post_text: Christmas just came early for all of us. The BMW i3 is all set to take over the streets of Singapore. Drop by 303 Alexandra Road and experience the all-electric BMW i3 for yourself.

19.post_text:
Which BMW i merchandise would you choose?

From BMW watches to the BMW i collection, you will find apparel and accessories to match your individual style at our showroom at 303 Alexandra Road.

20.post_text:
As Performance Motors celebrates 35 years of unrivalled performance, we are pleased to present 35 extraordinary deals on a range of BMW models from the stunning BMW 4 Series Convertible to the adventurous BMW X3.

To kick off the celebration, we’re offering a complimentary Yacht Experience and additional cash savings when you purchase selected BMW models. For those with a taste for adventure, we are also pleased to offer up to $10,000 cash savings on a range of BMW X models. 

Or, with Performance Direct, you can have the flexibility to drive off with a BMW of your choice, including the BMW 320i EfficientDynamics, BMW 5 Series and the all-new BMW i3 from just $1,999 per month with zero down payment.

To receive these offers, SMS “PML <space> your name” to 9184 2080. Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8051 for a test drive today.

21.post_text:
Are you here with us at the BMW Motorrad Open House to celebrate Performance Motors 35th Anniversary?

Check out the latest range of bikes. From the purely stunning BMW R nineT Roadster to the efficiently mobile C 600 Sport Maxi-Scooter, you are sure to find a ride that suits you.

Drop by our showroom at 315 Alexandra Road today.

22.post_text:
To give you the pleasure of driving, the BMW 3 Series combines exhilarating performance with the latest Efficient Dynamics technologies.

Visit 303 Alexandra Road to test drive the BMW 3 Series.

23.post_text:
In celebration of Performance Motors 35th Anniversary, BMW Motorrad invites you to join us at the BMW Motorrad Open House this Saturday, 15th November. 

Check out the latest range of bikes. From the purely stunning BMW R nineT Roadster to the efficiently mobile C 600 Sport Maxi-Scooter, you are sure to find a ride that suits you. 

To reserve a test ride on selected models, call us at 6319 0510.

24.post_text:
Lean back. The BMW i3 takes over from here.

Did you know that the Park Assistant on the BMW i3 makes child's play of parking – fully autonomously?

Try for yourself at our showroom today!
